modConstructionSpeedMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase of the construction speed for all buildings, ships, etc.

modConstructionTimeDecrease.modDesc: Fixed decrease of the construction time for all buildings, ships, etc.

modBuildSpeedMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in the building speed of all buildings

modBuildTimeDecrease.modDesc: Fixed decrease in the building time for all buildings

modBuildCostMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in the cost of all building upgrades

modResourceProductionMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in the quantity of resources extracted per hour

modResourceConsumptionMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in the quantity of resources consumed by buildings per hour

modEnergyProductionMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in the quantity of energy generated per hour

modEnergyConsumptionMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in the quantity of energy consumed per hour

modEnergyStorageCapacityIncrease.modDesc: Fixed increase in energy storage capacity

modEnergyStorageCapacityMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in energy storage capacity

modBuildingCapacityMultiplier.modDesc: Percentage increase in maximum number of buildings
